items.title: Fit intelligence, not guesswork
items.description: Our hybrid computer-vision + regression pipeline estimates key body measurements from simple captures. Your data is encrypted and shared only with the designer fulfilling your order.

items.title: Build your outfit from scratch your way
items.description: Bring your dream outfit to life! With Qlozet’s Bespoke Feature, you can mix and match styles, fabrics, and fits — then watch as our AI instantly visualizes your unique design, tailored perfectly to your body. Your imagination becomes your personal designer.

items.title: Personalize your outfits
items.description: Redefine your style, your way! With Qlozet’s Customization Feature, you can tweak every detail — from neckline and sleeve style to fabric texture and color — and see your look come alive in real time. It’s fashion that fits you, not the other way around.
